<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vile Desecration](/Feats.aspx?ID=1697) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
evil alignment

</column>

---

You combine unholy might with negative energy to damage [angels](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=3), [archons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=9), and other self-righteous denizens of the Outer Planes. When you cast a [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spell, you can change the damage you deal to [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) creatures to evil damage instead of negative damage.
name: Vile Desecration
